Public Remarks: Last night I dreamt of the perfect condo, it was a sun drenched South West corner home in the heart of Lower Lonsdale! Everything I needed was within walking distance of my front door and traveling to my favourite spots like Buddha-ful Cafe, Lift Bakery and the Lonsdale Quay made me feel lucky to be there. The dream continued... I prepared for work the next day, enjoying a cup of coffee and looked out from my desk, to the ocean. It was magical. But my thoughts were not about work.. The only troubling part of my dream was that I couldn't figure out if we should catch the Sea-Bus and eat downtown or dine local. What would you do?

Commission: 3.22% ON THE FIRST $100,000 PLUS 1.15% ON THE REMAINDER OF THE PURCHASE PRICE
Internet Remarks: In the family since 1944, this well-loved property, with its pristine cedar cottage and vistas of Howe Sound and the North Shore Mountains, is on the market for the first time. Impeccably maintained, and extensively updated in 2004, this 2 bed/2 bath home is small in size, but large in what it offers – an excellent opportunity to be a homeowner on Bowen Island, where rural life meets modern conveniences. Sitting on a bright, south facing lot, you’re never short of sunlight. Easy care deer-resistant plants and shrubs thrive among the rocky outcrops. Across the street is the trail to Eagle Cliff Beach, where generations of local residents get together for the time honoured tradition of ‘work parties’, helping each other to keep the beach and trails accessible, safe, and enjoyable for all. Douglas Fir and Cedar custom cabinetry, maple hardwood floors, and clever use of mirrors to expand the space visually, are just some of the special features of this lovely home.
Public Remarks: Kept in the family since 1944, this well-loved property, with its pristine cedar cottage and vistas of Howe Sound and the North Shore Mountains, is on the market for the very first time. Impeccably maintained, and extensively updated in 2004, this 2 bed/2 bath home is small in size, but large in what it offers – an excellent opportunity to be a homeowner on Bowen Island. Sitting on a bright, south facing lot, you’re never short of sunlight, morning or afternoon. Easy care deer-resistant plants and shrubs thrive among the rocky outcrops. More than 500 sf of decking is the perfect place to spot resident eagles soaring across the treetops. Across the street is the trail to Eagle Cliff Beach, which is kept in good order by ‘work parties’, a true Eagle Cliff community tradition.
Realtor Remarks: Floor plan by Measure Masters. Lot Size from BC Assessement. COVID protocols in place and waiver (in docs) must be signed.

Situated on 1.75 acres with over 200 feet of accessible sandstone beach, this cozy cottage, owned by an interior designer, enjoys a panoramic view from snow capped Mt. Baker to the east to the Sunshine Coast to the northwest. Sit by the seaside deck, listen to the soothing sounds of the ocean waves, walk along for miles in either direction on the tafoni beach looking for tidal pools, your favourite driftwood piece or rock or go for a dip in the ocean. Watch out for seals, river otters and whales. Lovely meadow invites you to ball games. Memorable summer sunrises and sunsets! Be pleasantly surprised, how much this 515 sqft 1 BR cottage + loft has to offer. Low maintenance. Simple. Magical. Memorable.
